coding.display: How often have you had five or more drinks in one day during the past year [Reported]

code.text: How often have you had five or more drinks in one day during the past year [Reported]

note.text: Some measures (like electronic Clinical Quality Measure (eCQM) used by CMS) define "risky drinker" differently based on sex: 4 or more drinks per day for women and 5 or more drinks per day for men. The LOINC for 4 or more drinks per day is [LOINC: 75889-6].

derivedFrom.display: Tobacco, Alcohol, Prescription medications, and other Substance use screen [TAPS] QuestionnaireResponse Example
